text:
Our tests don't run, and I have as yet been able to figure out the issue. I did fix the problem that zones has been showing in r636070. However, now I am seeing this what is below. Can someone take a look at this?

Could not find component (key [org.apache.excalibur.store.StoreJanitor]) (Key='org.apache.excalibur.store.StoreJanitor')

BUILD FAILED

creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text: As a workaround, I have added the missing declarations to the xtest template. But this is not a long-term solution. We have to find a way to import the necessary Cocoon role declarations automatically.
Since the tests are working again, I'm reducing the severity.
creator: andreas@apache.org
